title: Creative Co-Op DA2356 Tabletop Metal Chalkboard with Easel
features: 4 L x 3 H inches Metal Chalkboard with Easel
Perfect for displaying items at restaurants, parties, or any home use.
description: This little chalkboard makes a great reusable place card, or menu sign for a large spread. You can leave notes for your family or use it as an appointment reminder. When you have to leave your desk in the office, write where you went or when you will return. The options are endless.
